questions.text: What was the job the girls were given by the President?
What type of cookies did the girls bake for the President?
questions.explanation:
Hello Dollies.

	The girls baked Hello Dollies with a very interesting ingredient in them.

questions.text: What part of her looks did Arlene change to impress the President?
options: She wore a different shade of eyeshadow

questions.text: Who was the President in the time era of the movie?
questions.explanation:
Richard Nixon.

	Also known as Dick, hence the title of the movie.

questions.text: Larry became very rich? True or False?
Because Betsy and Arlene got off track at the field trip to the White House, to where did the class miss a field trip lunch?
At the end of the movie what did Dick go away in, when the girls showed him their sign?
When Betsy said, 'Isn't cutting up the flag illegal?' what did Arlene reply with?
questions.correct: 'Not if you sew it back together'
questions.explanation: 'Not if you sew it back together'.

questions.text: When Arlene was trying to tell Betsy that they were being bugged by the President, what song did she put on?
What was the name of the President's dog?

Who was Arlene's love in the very beginning of the movie?

questions.explanation:
The President's office.
